title: Nvidia's Project Digits is a 'personal AI supercomputer'
author: magicalhippo
aiHeadline: Nvidia Just Unveiled Project Digits, a 'Personal AI Supercomputer' That Will Probably Make Your Current Computer Feel Like a Toy from the Stone Age, and Honestly, Who Needs Human Intelligence When You Can Have AI Doing All the Heavy Lifting?

title: Ending our third party fact-checking program and moving to Community Notes model
author: impish9208
aiHeadline: In a Shocking Move, Meta Has Decided to End Its Third-Party Fact-Checking Program, Opting Instead for a Community Notes Model, Because What Could Possibly Go Wrong When You Let the Internet Police Itself, and We're Sure This Won't Lead to a Dystopian Free-for-All of Misinformation and Chaos

title: A minimax chess engine in regular expressions
author: ilya_m
aiHeadline: Some Genius Has Managed to Create a Minimax Chess Engine Using Regular Expressions, Because Who Needs a Social Life When You Can Spend Your Time Crafting Ingenious Solutions to Complex Problems, and We're Not Sure What's More Impressive, the Fact That It Works or the Fact That Someone Actually Had the Patience to Do This

title: Nvidia announces next-gen RTX 5090 and RTX 5080 GPUs
author: somebee
aiHeadline: Nvidia Has Announced Its Next-Gen RTX 5090 and RTX 5080 GPUs, Because the Only Thing More Impressive Than the specs Is the Likely Size of the Hole It'll Burn in Your Wallet, and Let's Be Real, If You're Buying This, You're Probably Either a Hardcore Gamer or a Cryptominer, and Either Way, You're Probably Going to Need a Second Mortgage

title: Show HN: Tramway SDK â€“ The Unholy Union Between Half-Life and Morrowind Engines
author: racenis
aiHeadline: In a Bizarre Fusion of Two Beloved Games, Someone Has Created the Tramway SDK, Which Mashes Up the Half-Life and Morrowind Engines, and We're Not Entirely Sure What to Make of This Frankenstein's Monster of Game Development, But Hey, at Least It's Not Another Battle Royale Game, and Who Knows, Maybe This Will Be the Start of a Beautiful New Trend in Gaming
